description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Snowball+Avatars+LIVE Multiplay+Winter Classical Songs+Falling Snow+Flashing Lights+Powerups+ YOU = Exciting Snowball Fight! Start your fight now in Arcade, LIVE Multiplay, Versus and Survival game mode! Don't forget to check out the customizable screensaver and the secret mode! Get more points to enter the ranking tables and unlock new items!
